attributes.title: No Ma’am!!
attributes.review: A complete waste of an app and data. All I wanted was to be more up to date with the President’s plans to ruin my life, and this is what we get? Nothing but glitches and not to mention more racist, homophobic, sexist, xenophobic rhetoric than I could ever expect. I highly recommend voting against this platform at all possible costs. Blasphemous

attributes.title: This app makes me want to throw up 🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to know what’s going on, but the second I did it gave me a VIRUS!! After 8 seconds my phone shut off completely and spontaneously combusted! This app is more stank than the hot cheeto breath of all the girls in my school. I would rate 0 stars if I could, do not download under any circumstances.

attributes.title: IT STOLE MY UNICORN
attributes.review: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE!! i downloaded it and it stole my unicorn! so i went to get chipotle and i had my unicorn in its cabin so it didn’t fly away and i came home and it was gone but on the cabin there was a note that said “we stole your unicorn and you can’t get another one” so i am very mad and i would give this 0 stars if it was possible but do not download it.

attributes.title: oh boy am i disappointed
attributes.review: very disappointed 😭🤬 whenever i opened the app the duolingo bird threatened to deport my family until i got off the app 😤🥵 also there was this rando oompa loompa’s pic all over the app ???? 🙃😬 the ads inside of this app were ASTRONOMICAL 😑😡 and i would get constant notifications 🙄🥱 dont know why anyone would get this app ✨🌸🧚🏼🥰

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I opened the app and immediately felt sick to my stomach. I was disgusted and I felt violated. It was getting hard to breathe like my throat was closing up. I had to close the app before I...I don’t know died maybe. This app is vile. I would not recommend unless you genuinely want to commit die. Delete this app. It’s disrespectful to the entirety of the human race.

attributes.title: Wrecked my phone!!!
attributes.review: The phone I have is new and has soooo much space on it so when I downloaded this app to keep up to date on Trumps campaign I was excited. But immediately after downloading my phone kept crashing!!! And every time I opened my phone it would crash again worst app ever!!!

attributes.title: My pet dinosaur diez from da appz
attributes.review: I was a 19 IIt was badger day today so we went to the house and they were doing a great job of making the kids so I showed them the app and they die I faint then I was in the doctor officccce (I had to write this in the tv) thence is a time to get a little better this game it was epic but the app is not a bad app I cannot I was actually naked

attributes.title: Didn’t pass the vibe check
attributes.review: I saw this on my phone and was like 👁👄👁, I wanted to support our 🧚🌟honorable President Donald Trump🌸❤️ but this app just didn’t allow that! Our president should NOT have to deal with such a horrible app! This app is an embarrassment🔥🧚‍♂️💓 to such an AMAZING president, shouldn’t we respect our president by removing this low-quality application? 🤝👏🥴

attributes.title: never again smh
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because #trump2020 and when i opened it all i saw was this cheeto talking.. My phone started glitching, there were too many ads, and it shut off my phone😡😡 I would never get this app ever again because of how bad it was it should have ✨ZERO stars✨

attributes.title: Bad service
attributes.review: I downloadedThis app and it was terrible. I kept on trying to get into the app and it kept unlocking my phone. Like this hot Cheetos man is really trying to message my phone. I literally will never ever ever ever ever vote for him because he is messing with my phone. Plus the skies are racist and I don’t want no racist man rolling for America. #BringBackBarackObama#Hate2020 #IDon’tLikeDonaldTrump #GoToHell
